attributes.action: take the Knighthood back from Salman Rushdie.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Salman Rushdie has done no service to the Britain or to the literature. He does not deserve knighthood on his merits. He has only caused distress to Muslims worldwide. The act of knighting him is an insult to the Muslims in itself. The knighthood MUST be taken back from him immediately. The Queen and the Prime Minister should also apologize to the 1.5 billion Muslims of the world.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence –
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Rushdie/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
